Dr. Szczeklik would be adept at interpreting the results of these tests, considering their limitations, and integrating them into the overall clinical picture. *   **Management of Chronic Diseases:** Internal Medicine physicians are often the primary care providers for patients with chronic conditions such as hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). Dr. Szczeklik would possess extensive knowledge of these diseases, their complications, and the various treatment options available.
